clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Cognitive Intervention on Cognition, Mobility and Brain Electrocortical Activity
clinical_study.official_title: Holistic Approach for Active and Healthy Aging: Physical and Cognitive Activity, and Nutrition

brief_summary.textblock: Within this project the investigators tested the effectiveness of 2-month of computerized cognitive training (CCT) on CogniFit online platform on 77 older adults, which were randomly divided into intervention and control group. The investigators tested close (battery of cognitive functions) and far transfer (postural and mobility control, EEG, blood samples) of the CCT. Additionally, the investigators were interested into seeing a long-lasting effect, therefore participants were brought back to the laboratory 1 year post CCT.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Participants in the intervention group followed a computerized cognitive training program for 2-months, 3x/week, 40min/session

primary_outcome.description: The primary outcome is change in gait speed during single- and dual-task conditions from baseline to post-intervention.

secondary_outcome.measure: Executive control (Trail-Making Task Forms A and B)
secondary_outcome.description: Secondary outcome is change in executive control, measured with TMT A and B tests

secondary_outcome.measure: Sensorimotor integration measured with EEG/ERP methodology
secondary_outcome.description: Secondary outcome is change ERP components P1, N1, P2 and P3 (amplitudes and latencies)

secondary_outcome.measure: Brain-derived neurotrophic factor (BDNF) extracted from peripheral blood sampling
secondary_outcome.description: Secondary outcome is change in plasma BDNF plasma extraction evaluated in pg/mL

arm_group.description: Participants in the intervention group received 24 sessions of computerized cognitive training, with a total time of 960 min.

Participants in the control group attended activities separate activities, such as learning about healthy lifestyle, had cooking and other social lessons for the same amount as the intervention group performed cognitive training.

intervention.description: Intervention used CogniFit platform with Personalized brain training sub-option
